resources.string: Croc nets banned to save community

Salty numbers out of control, as CLP leader Lia Finocchiaro calls for a cull. Unpopular decision with conservationists, popular with lovers of watersports, Finocchiaro is accused of politicing the decision.
Footy is back in the NT with 4 games at TIO and Alice stadiums this season. Get your tickets as they are sure to sell out fast!
Get out your socks and crocs as temperature is forecast to dip below 23 degrees C.
Thins announces discontinuation of cult favourite Light \'n Tangy, causing a rush to stores from punters hoping to secure supplies.
Global surveys reveal Australia\'s Northern Territory at the top of the bucket list for international travellers over 55
Controversial decision to ban installation of croc nets at NT beaches, in order to prevent tourist flood and overdevelopment of protected waterfront reserves in Darwin
